posts.post_content:
No matter where you go the cats are watching you. Just look at those eyes.  
  
Also, this in foil will be sweet.  
  
And for those that wonder how random discard should work, rolling a dice or having the other player pick the card is normally a good way to do it.

Posted By: Dragasm (8/9/2012 8:43:20 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I have found an excellent way to use these.  
  
With [Heartless Summoning](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Heartless Summoning) out, he becomes a (B) Sorcery. Add a [Harvester of Souls](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Harvester of Souls) out early with Heartless, it becomes a cheap, strong two-card advantage swing. Run four cats, Heartless, and a way to bring them back repeatedly, and you will instill despair in many high-end decks.
posts.html:
